collective.amberjack.portlet
----------------------------

This package provides portlet for collective.amberjack package.

Be aware that series 0.9.x is compatible with Plone3, series 1.x is compatible
with Plone4.

Useful links
============

- project wiki, info: http://www.coactivate.org/projects/collectiveamberjack
- pypi: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/collective.amberjack.portlet
- Plone: http://plone.org/products/collective.amberjack.portlet
- issue tracker: https://bugs.launchpad.net/collective.amberjack
- svn repository: http://svn.plone.org/svn/collective/collective.amberjack.portlet
